about_the_game:
What occurs in this riveting simulation?

Explore different Floridian environments on a hunt for pesky Gators. Use your trusty firearms and hunting experience to clear golf courses, beaches, and backwoods of the meanest dino-cousins in the Americas. All of this while beating the summer heat and your insatiable desire for popular illegal Miami substances.

Features

  • Kawaii Gators!
  • Epic cutscene phonecalls
  • A subtle and deceptively deep backstory that only the highest IQ gamers will notice through my intentionally thick veil of simplicity (because I'm super deep)
  • The dumbest AI you'll probably ever encounter in a videogame
  • 1980's Atmosphere and soothing synth soundtrack

Future Plans


While we have some ideas for the future following release such as additional post-story levels, we would like for the community to decide what type of events and content they would like to see. While resources and time are limited, I would love to foster a speed-running community or give out prizes to people who can decode the game's underlying plot. (Not to mention the possible discovery of the super secret room).



Enjoy the vibes 😎

content_descriptors.notes: Violence (including blood) as well as the mention and using of illegal drugs in-game.

legal_notice: Trailer Song: Bodywork by VHS Dreams
name: Florida Simulator 1986

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Play as Kevin the gator' hunter during the hot Florida summer of 86' in this super immersive s i m u l a t i o n 😎.
